import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react'; import './Stair.scss' export const Stair = () => { const stairsRef = useRef(null) const[stepCount,setStepCount]= useState(1) useEffect(()=>{ const div = stairsRef.current; const rect = div.getBoundingClientRect(); console.log(rect.width,rect.height) }) return ( <>
) }
